titleStmt.title: An account of the late bloody sea-fight between part of Their Majesties fleet commanded by Sir Clovesly Shovel, and that of the French fleet commanded by the sieurs Turville and Ampheville with the sinking of three of the French men of war, one of which was a vice admiral.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Nicholas, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
